Flying
Discard a card: Target creature you control becomes a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard in addition to its other types until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

Flying, vigilance
When this artifact enters, search your library for a basic land card or Town card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Crew 1 [i](Tap creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When equipped creature becomes blocked, sacrifice this artifact. When you do, this artifact deals 9999 damage to each creature blocking equipped creature.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {3} [i]({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]
When this creature enters, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The impact sent the soldiers scattering— then something came out of the crater.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this artifact enters, target Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.
Crew 2 [i](Tap creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Equipped creature has flying.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Equip {2} [i]({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]

{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{4}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature in your party. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]

Incite abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.
You may activate incite abilities from your hand as if they were in your graveyard. You may play cards exiled this way as long as they remain in exile.

Whenever an opponent activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, put a +1/+1 counter on this artifact unless they pay {1}.
Flying, double strike
Crew 3 [i](Tap creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Whenever equipped creature attacks, create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Sacrifice an Aether: Tap or untap up to one target nonland permanent. Put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature.
Equip {2} [i]({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]

cards.special_text:
Planeswalkers you control may be tapped to pay costs as though they were creatures with power and toughness each equal to their loyalty.
[+1]: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play an artifact or colorless card exiled by a Cid planeswalker you control. [i](You still pay that card's costs.)[/i]
[-2]: Search your library for a card with one or more artifact types, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. [i](Equipment and Vehicle are artifact types.)[/i]
